data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Arteries have a thicker wall and a smaller inside hole than veins. The ____ for ____ is ____ arteries ____ blood ____ is ____ all ____ the ____. That ____ requires a lot ____ power ____ the ____. This pumping causes high pressure, and so the walls of the artery need to be thick and strong.

That pum____ requires a lot o_ power fr__ the he___. This pumping causes high pressure, and so the walls of the artery need to be thick and strong.
data.answer: 动脉比静脉壁厚，内部孔小。原因是动脉将血液输送到全身。这种跳动需要来自心脏的大量能量。这种泵送过程会导致高压，因此动脉壁需要变得又厚又结实。
